response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This price not only represents a significant saving but also ensures that you acquire a high-quality asset at an attractive cost. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
